jcurses.widgets
类 ScrollbarPainter

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.widgets.ScrollbarPainter

public class ScrollbarPainter
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used by widgets, having scrollable content, to paint scrollbars. The class jcurses.util.ScrollbarUtils is deprecated.

构造方法摘要
ScrollbarPainter(IScrollable widget)
          The constructor
 
方法摘要
 void paint()
          This method must be called, if the widget is painted or repainted.
 void refresh()
          This method is to be called if the scrollable content ( or it's position ) has been ( or could have been ) changed, to refresh scrollbars only if needed.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

ScrollbarPainter

public ScrollbarPainter(IScrollable widget)
The constructor

参数：
widget - the widget, that needs scrollbars
方法详细信息

paint

public void paint()
This method must be called, if the widget is painted or repainted. If the the widget was already visible, but the content (position ) has been changed, the method refresh must be used

refresh

public void refresh()
This method is to be called if the scrollable content ( or it's position ) has been ( or could have been ) changed, to refresh scrollbars only if needed.
